form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Form I-687 ( (04/01/87) Page 2, Screeneded by NARA, 7/13/2023

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/13/2023 If you were admitted as a nonimmigrant, complete items 22 through 30; if not, leave blank and continue on item 31. 22. Passport Number 23. Country that Issued Passport 24. Location Visa Issued 109957 (City and Country of U.S. Consul) Nicaragua Managua, Nicaragua 25. Type of Visa Issued (B-2, F-1, etc.) 26. Date Visa Issued (Month/Day/Year) 27. Authorized Stay in U.S. Expired (Month/Day/Year) B-2 04/23/70 10/23/70 28. Visa Class (Student, visitor. etc.) 29. Did you violate your legal status? 30. Were you notified of your violation? No Yes If "Yes", explain violation and date. No Yes If "Yes", explain how notified Visitor Overstayed 31. l'have been married 0 times. I have (fill in total number now living, whether in the U.S. or not.) 0 sons and daughters, and 6 brothers and sisters. 32. Complete all columns below for your spouse, each former spouse, and each son, daughter, brother and sister. Under Name, give first name and middle initial (give last name only if it differs from your own). Under Relationship, fill in spouse, former spouse, son, daughter, brother or sister. Under Date of Birth, give month, day, and year of birth. Under Place of Birth, give city, state and country of birth. Under Location Where Now Living, give city, state and country of current residence (if living with you, write "with me" in the column). In the last column write "Yes", "No", or "Unknown" to indicate if each is applying for residence in the U.S. If more space is needed, attach an additional sheet. Indicate on the sheet that the information refers to question #32. Full Name U.S. Location Where (Include maiden name if applicable) Relationship Citizen? Date of Birth Place of Birth Now Living Applying? Yes Managua Rodolfo brother 01/12/01 E1 Monte, CA no No Nicaragua USA Blanca sister Yes No 12/13/01 " " with me no Yes Angelica sister 05/13/06 11 No " LA, CA USA no Yes Zoila sister No 01/17/04 " " with me no Yes Salvador brother No 12/15/08 " " Managua no Nicaragua Yes Horacio brother XNo 08/13/10 " " " " no Yes No Yes No Yes No Yes No Yes No Yes No Yes No 33. List all of your residences in the United States since your first entry, beginning with your present address (attach an additional sheet, if necessary). From To Street Name and Number (Apt. No.) City State and ZIP Code (Month/Year) (Month/Year) 225 N. 2nd St. Montebello CA Unk. 06/83 Present 1642 S. New Hampshire Los Angeles CA 90006 01/73 06/83 1702 S.
